text: Sophie Okonedo (born 11 August 1968) is an English Tony Award-winning actress. She was born in London. She was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for her role in Hotel Rwanda (2004). She also appeared in Ã†on Flux (2005), Skin (2008), The Secret Life of Bees (2008), and Christopher Robin (2018). Okonedo was appointed an Officer of the Order of the British Empire (OBE) in 2010 and Commander of the Order of the British Empire (CBE) in 2019. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from London Category:Tony Award winning actors Category:European Jews
title: Sophie Okonedo
